**Tender Announcement: Disques Flash de Pure Storage (BPM020640)**
===========================================================

**General Information**
----------------------

* **Tender Title:** Disques Flash de Pure Storage (BPM020640)
* **Reference Number:** SSC-24-00025283:T
* **Amendment Number:** 5
* **Publication Date:** January 22, 2024
* **Closing Date:** February 8, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST

**Summary**
-----------

Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites bidders to submit proposals for the supply of Pure Storage FlashArray. This solicitation is open to suppliers who meet the eligibility criteria outlined in the attached documents. The tender description and requirements can be found in the solicitation documents.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity**
-------------------------

The bidder must be prepared to fulfill the requirements of the contract in the following regions:

* National Capital Region (NCR)
* Ontario (except NCR)

**Instrument Multiplets**
------------------------

The following documents must be submitted as part of the proposal:

* Tender Description (English)
* Tender Description (French)
* Trade Agreements (English)
* Trade Agreements (French)

**How to Access Solicitation Documents**
---------------------------------------

To access the solicitation documents, please visit the P2P Portal at [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public). Under Solicitation List, select BPM020640.

**Time Limitation for Receipt of Proposals**

All proposals must be received by SSC no later than February 8, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST.

**Bidder Inquiries**
-------------------
